feed.title: Tony Tang's Channel
feed.subtitle: Tony Tang is currently an iOS developer, a UX designer, and a Lifelong learner. He is a UCSD'23er, a research assistant @ UCSD Mobile Systems Design Lab, and a staff member @ CSES. Meanwhile, he developed HummingKit framework, Count Now app, and Beat On app. Tony Tang was awarded WWDC 18 Scholarship and was a WWDC 20 Swift Student Challenge Winner.
